desc.p: The valuation of the proposed change in holding in portfolio security currency
Amount valuation proposed by automatic rebalancing process.
The short name of the SECURITY.MASTER
Securities price type.
The projected valuation of this holding in portfolio reference currency should the order be filled
The status of the order
The projected nominal holding should the order be filled
Specifies the operator who is working on a Security block of the scenario.
The portfolio ID
Price at which the order is created. Default is security master market price.
The SECURITY.MASTER id for the proposed order
Securities currency
Valuation of transaction.
The valuation of the proposed change in holding in portfolio reference currency
The proposed change in holding against the total portfolio valuation
This field has value consideration amt + interest amt , if accrued interest field of AM.PARAMETER is INCLUDE .If its EXCLUDE it has only consideration amt.
The id of the record from the application that created this record
Keyed on the session number and the portfolio number.
The projected percentage of this holding against the total portfolio valuation should the order be filled
Specifies the nominal amount of the security. Store an override if violated securities trading units.
SEC.OPEN.ORDER identifier. Populate when generate open orders.
The portfolio account name
Account currency
Exchange rate for conversion between security currency and settlement currency.
Stores overrides raised while processing the order
This field contains the total valuation of a portfolio.
The portfolio Currency
Define direction of pre-orders.
BUY or SELL
Amount valuation calculated with market price, securities price type and nominal.
The projected valuation of this holding in security currency shoudl the order be filled
Nominal holding by customer in specified portfolio.
The ID of this record
The proposed nominal change in holding
Specify the account over which the movement of the security in the transaction will be recorded.
Must be a valid account number of the specified portfolio.
Define if block will be selected for generate order process or simulate process.
Yes or No (default blank is No)
Define if block will not be clear by SELL or BUY option in "clear.scenario" process.
Yes or No (default blank is No)
The current Nominal holding by customer in specified portfolio.
The current percentage of this holding against the total portfolio valuation
The current valuation of this holding in portfolio reference currency
The current valuation of this holding in security currency
